articles.title: Beijing flooded as China sees highest rainfall in 140 years | In pics - India Today
articles.description: China’s capital recorded its heaviest rainfall in at least 140 years over the past few days as remnants of Typhoon Doksuri deluged the region, turning streets into canals where emergency crews used rubber boats to rescue stranded residents.
articles.content:
The city recorded 744.8 millimeters (29.3 inches) of rain between Saturday and Wednesday morning, the Beijing Meteorological Bureau said Wednesday, reported news agency AP. 
Photo Credit : reuters
